project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions and keeps track of the user's score.

task.name: Implement the question structure and store questions and answers in a variable
Create the function to present questions and gather user input
Implement the scoring system to track correct answers
Display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the implemented features
Execute tests to ensure that the quiz game functions correctly
